titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for preuention of abuses of informers, clerkes, and others in their prosecutions vpon the lawes, and statutes of this realme.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVindsor, the sixth day of September, in the eleuenth yeere of our reigne of Great Brittaine, France, and Ireland.
Arms 21; Steele notation: this nexed 2) vn- 3) generall 4) sayd 5) Domi them.
Identified as Wing C2591 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
